name: Ashi Wash
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470, AMD HD 7870 Storage: 650 MB available space Additional Notes: for non-VR gameplay
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970, AMD Radeon 9290 Storage: 650 MB available space Additional Notes: for VR gameplay
